alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Piatt and northern Champaign Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mansfield, or 11 miles north of Monticello, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mahomet around 700 PM CDT. Lake Of The Woods around 705 PM CDT. Fisher around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Thomasboro, Rantoul and Gifford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 244 and 257. Interstate 72 between mile markers 168 and 175. Interstate 74 between mile markers 162 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Illinois.
